name: Logical Chaos
description:
This is the game I have made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

It is a simple top-down shooting game with an interesting mechanic, you don't have to destroy everything, instead let there be chaos, as the theme suggested.

For additional tips about how to play the game check the "INFO" from the main menu.

Hope you enjoy it!

Credits for the amazing skyboxes:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/3-skyboxes-25142
